title: Color Scheme Helpers
text: palette provides lightweight infrastructure working color palettes R. primary goal place colors directly next character representations. , create palette class based vctrs. provide methods class, including print(), plot(), pillar. keep lightweight usable packages, direct dependencies vctrs, cli, pillar.

title: Color Scheme Helpers
text: can install development version palette GitHub :

title: Color Scheme Helpers
text: palette primarily provides palette vctrs class. Using included data, roygbiv, length 7 vector hex codes, can create palette.   also plot() method visualizing colors:  use within tibbles, pillar_shaft method:
code: library(palette) #>  #> Attaching package: 'palette' #> The following object is masked from 'package:grDevices': #>  #>     palette palette(roygbiv) plot(palette(roygbiv)) tibble::tibble(   color = palette(roygbiv) )

title: palette: Color Scheme Helpers — palette-package
text: Hexadecimal codes typically used represent colors R. Connecting codes colors requires practice memorization. 'palette' provides 'vctrs' class working color palettes, including printing plotting functions. goal class place visual representations color palettes directly , least, next corresponding character representations. Palette extensions also provided data frames using 'pillar'.

title: Create a palette — palette
text: palette class color palettes built vctrs. represented character vector hexadecimal color codes. Named colors (like 'red') translated hexadecimal color codes.

Build a palette function — palette_function
text: Creates palette function use within ggplot2 argument discrete_scale. number colors requested greater length palette, palette repeated. number colors requested less length palette, palette truncated. done explicitly, vctrs recycling purposefully recycle partial lengths, like vector size 10 vector size 3 13.

title: Build a palette function — palette_function
text: function takes integer n returns vector n colors

title: Plot Palette Colors — plot_palette
text: x palette use_names names palette used labels? Default: TRUE. use_ggplot plot made ggplot2 available? Default: TRUE.

title: palette 0.0.1
text: Initial CRAN submission. palette vectors can plotted using plot(). palette vectors pretty printing console. palette vectors tibbles pillar methods color display. Adds palette_function() generator use palettes within ggplot2 discrete scales. Implements testing testthat vdiffr.
